title: Statement by The Press Secretary on H.R. 2997 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House



For Immediate Release
October 21, 2009

 



Statement by The Press Secretary on H.R. 2997





THE WHITE HOUSE

Office of the Press Secretary
__________________________________________________________________________
For Immediate Release                                                                                                October 21, 2009

STATEMENT BY THE PRESS SECRETARY
 

On Wednesday, October 21, 2009, the President signed into law:
H.R. 2997, the “Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2010,” which provides FY 2010 appropriations for the Department of Agriculture, the Department of Health and Human Services, and other related agencies.
